location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Kaye, Accountant General at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a copy of a letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay, to John Kaye, dated 26 March 1816, which sets out the rate of pay for William Bruce and the establishment allowance. Kaye requests that Bruce amend his accounts accordingly.
